mdRecord.dcterms:description: an International Style building complex set in a composed landscape in Henrico County, near Richmond, Virginia, completed in 1958. The low-rise Executive Office Building was designed by Gordon Bunshaft of Skidmore, Owings and Merrill, in collaboration with Richmond landscape architect Charles F. Gillette. The headquarters complex has been cited as a prototype for modern suburban office development. …The property is owned by the University of Richmond. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reynolds_Metals_Company_International_Headquarters [work]
